message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $15000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $15000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $10000 for it. Can you consider my offer?

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand it's a bit higher than your budget, but I'm willing to compromise. I can offer it to you for $12500. It's a great price for a product of this quality, and I think you'll really love it. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, $12500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $11000 for the product. Can you consider my offer?

I understand that $11000 is still a bit lower than my target price, but I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer it to you for $12250. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really get a lot of value out of this product. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, $12250 is still a bit higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay $11500 for the product. Can you consider my offer?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my target price. I can offer it to you for $12750. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really get a lot of value out of this product. What do you think?
I understand that you're trying to get closer to your target price, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with $12750. I'm willing to pay $12000 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
